CommandDefinition.Name: buildfilterproject
CommandDefinition.Description: Create a filter template to import in Eclipse.

Argument.Name: targetDirectory
Argument.Description: The path to which the template zip file is written. If this parameter is not provided and a CodeAccess is defined, the filter will be added to the CodeAccess.

Argument.Name: filterName
Argument.Description: The name for the new filter, such that <name>Filter makes sense, e.g. 'HTTPWebServer'

Argument.Name: triggerName
Argument.Description: The name for the existing trigger, for which the new filter will be implemented
